Html:
I cannot load this website. Error:

Server Error in '/2.0-RC1' Application.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Compilation Error
Description: An error occurred during the compilation of a resource required to service this request. Please review the following specific error details and modify your source code appropriately.

Compiler Error Message: BC30002: Type 'DataSetTableAdapters.MemberInfoTableAdapter' is not defined.

Source Error:



Line 7: Public Shared Function Getmembers(ByVal Filter As String) As Generic.List(Of MemberDetails)
Line 8: Dim l As New Generic.List(Of MemberDetails)
Line 9: Dim da As New DataSetTableAdapters.MemberInfoTableAdapter
Line 10: Dim members As DataSet.MemberInfoDataTable = da.GetMemberList()
Line 11: For Each user As MembershipUser In Membership.GetAllUsers


Source File: C:\Documents and Settings\Jerry Dean\Desktop\2.0-RC1\App_Code\MemberDetails.vb Line: 9
This is probably a database issue. Are you using SQL Express straight out of the box?

z2bass wrote:
This is probably a database issue. Are you using SQL Express straight out of the box?


Noe this error is coming up:

Parser Error
Description: An error occurred during the parsing of a resource required to service this request. Please review the following specific parse error details and modify your source file appropriately.

Parser Error Message: Unknown server tag 'Club:RolloverButton'.

Source Error:


Line 91: <p>
Line 92: </p>
Line 93: <Club:RolloverButton runat="server" ValidationGroup="Login1" Text="Login" ID="LoginButton"
Line 94: CommandName="Login" />
Line 95: <p>

Well I got by all of the above but am now getting this error:
I can test and get a successful connection in the database explorer window.
